mapper.update: UPDATE pt_flow_instance_task SET status = #{status}, operation_code = #{operationCode}, operation_name = #{operationName}, end_date = #{endDate}, user_note = #{userNote}, source = #{source}, source_id = #{sourceId}, msg_id = #{msgId} WHERE id = #{taskId}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id instanceId, d.approver_id approverId, d.approver_name approverName FROM pt_flow_instance a, pt_flow_instance_ac b, pt_flow_instance_group c, pt_flow_instance_task d WHERE a.id = b.fi_id AND b.id = c.ac_id AND c.id = d.group_id AND d.status=2
ORDER BY a.id

SELECT COUNT(t.id) FROM pt_flow_instance_task t LEFT JOIN pt_flow_instance_group g ON(t.group_id = g.id AND g.delflag = 0) LEFT JOIN pt_flow_instance_post p ON(g.ac_post_id = p.id AND p.delflag = 0) LEFT JOIN pt_flow_instance_ac ac ON(p.ac_id = ac.id AND ac.delflag = 0) LEFT JOIN pt_flow_instance i ON(ac.fi_id = i.id AND i.delflag = 0) WHERE t.`status` = 3 AND t.delflag = 0 AND t.type != 1 AND i.id = #{instanceId}

SELECT t.id, t.approver_id AS approverId, t.approver_name AS approverName, t.activate_date activateDate, t.end_date, t.`status` AS STATUS, m.is_open AS isOpen FROM pt_flow_instance_task t, pt_flow_instance_group g, pt_flow_instance_post p, pt_flow_instance_ac ac, pt_flow_sys_notice_msg m WHERE t.group_id = g.id AND g.ac_post_id = p.id AND ac.id = p.ac_id AND t.msg_id = m.id AND t.delflag = 0 AND g.delflag = 0 AND p.delflag = 0 AND ac.delflag = 0 AND m.delflag = 0 AND ac.fi_id = #{instanceId} AND t.activate_date >= ( SELECT tt.end_date FROM pt_flow_instance_task tt WHERE tt.id = #{taskId} )

SELECT t.id, t.type, ac.approve_type_id approveType, t.approver_id AS approverId, t.approver_name AS approverName, t.activate_date activateDate, t.end_date, t.`status` AS STATUS, t.msg_id msgId FROM pt_flow_instance_task t, pt_flow_instance_group g, pt_flow_instance_post p, pt_flow_instance_ac ac WHERE t.group_id = g.id AND g.ac_post_id = p.id AND ac.id = p.ac_id AND t.delflag = 0 AND g.delflag = 0 AND p.delflag = 0 AND ac.delflag = 0 AND t.status = 2 AND ac.fi_id = #{instanceId} AND t.approver_id=#{userId}
